author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
On May 20, a man who had been chasing his unpaid wages—just 800 yuan—for over six months reportedly set fire to a textile factory, causing 8 million yuan in damages. But before the fire, he warned the workers to get out. No one was hurt.

Online, people are calling him a hero—“Brother 800”—a symbol of workers’ desperation and rage. They say he burned down more than a factory—he burned out injustice.

But state media and police say he was just mentally unstable, suicidal, and driven by personal despair.

So which is it: a tragic criminal—or a working-class martyr in China’s broken labor system?

Watch the full story and decide for yourself.

🔔 Subscribe for more uncensored reports from inside China
💬 What do you think—hero or crime? Comment below
#Brother800 #ChinaWages #CCPCoverup #LaborRights #ChinaNews #TextileFactoryFire #ChineseWorkers #WageTheft
title: He Set Fire for 800 Yuan—Hero or Criminal? China’s Wage War Just Exploded

author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
China is pouring 4 billion yuan into building and expanding funeral homes—just in Shanxi Province alone. Meanwhile, hospitals across the country are overwhelmed, crematoriums are packed, and the death toll is quietly rising. But official reports remain silent.

COVID? Flu? Norovirus? Heart attacks? No one knows for sure—because no one’s telling the truth. Families are losing loved ones who had no prior illnesses. Young, healthy people are dying unexpectedly. Some say the number of deaths now exceeds the worst days of the pandemic.

In this video, we break down what’s really happening inside China’s overwhelmed healthcare and funeral systems—and why the silence is more terrifying than the numbers.

🔴 Subscribe for more real stories from inside China.
📌 Leave a comment—have you seen similar reports?
#China #FuneralHomes #CovidInChina #ChineseGovernment #Coverup #PublicHealthCrisis #DeathSurge #HospitalsFull
title: ¥4 Billion on Funeral Homes as Hospitals Overflow and Deaths Spike — But No One's Talking About It
